TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed EKCalendarEventAvailability extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the types of availability information the calendar is capable of providing for its associated events.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype EventKit.EKCalendarEventAvailability Busy = unsigned int64(1)

Docs.summary: The calendar can provide busy status for its associated events.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype EventKit.EKCalendarEventAvailability Free = unsigned int64(2)

Docs.summary: The calendar can provide free status for its associated events.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype EventKit.EKCalendarEventAvailability None = unsigned int64(0)

Docs.summary: The calendar cannot provide availability status for its associated events.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype EventKit.EKCalendarEventAvailability Tentative = unsigned int64(4)

Docs.summary: The calendar can provide tentative status for its associated events.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype EventKit.EKCalendarEventAvailability Unavailable = unsigned int64(8)

Docs.summary: The calendar can provide unavailable status for its associated events.
